snippet: John A. Catsimatidis, a Republican, and Anthony D. Weiner, a Democrat, were each winners in one statistic: money spent for every losing primary vote.
abstract: Republican John A Catsimatidis and Democrat Anthony D Weiner are each winners in one statistic in New York mayoral race--in money spent for every losing primary vote; Catsimatidis spent $419 per vote and Weiner spent more than $190 per vote.
lead_paragraph: John A. Catsimatidis, a Republican, and Anthony D. Weiner, a Democrat, were each winners in one statistic: money spent for every losing primary vote.

headline.main: Catsimatidis Spent $419 for Each Vote in Primary
headline.print_headline: Catsimatidis Spent $419 For Each Vote in Primary
